website_summaries.verdict: Great for oily skin, these pore strips are made with natural charcoal that works to lift out deep-down dirt, oil, and blackheads.
cons: Some have said the original Biore strips work better for them

website_summaries.verdict: A simple solution for removing mild to moderate blackheads, especially on and around the nose. Made by a popular brand in skincare.
pros: Easy-to-use strips that attach to blackheads and lift them away
Infused with charcoal that helps purify skin
Easy to use, and can help prevent blackheads from reoccurring when used on a regular basis
cons: May not work for users who need deep-cleaning to remove blackheads
Painful when the strips tug at fine facial hair during removal

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid off stubborn blackheads
customer_reviews.text: These are great to relieve congested pores on my nose! I find that to achieve the best results, you have to prep with HOT water on your nose. When the strip becomes stiff, peel it off SLOWLY, peeling from each outer corner in.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Always the best nose strips! I use them every four day. Love it so much! It works on me and I would use some toners and facial mask after this every time . It makes my skin on chin and nose smooth and looks better
customer_reviews.author: Christina100222

customer_reviews.title: it works perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: i didnt know if i should believe in it or not given all the comments but i decided to give it a try and used on me and my mom too. it is gross how much stuff it gets out of your skin!!! just follow the instructions, dont leave it on for over 15min and make sure your skin is wet when you put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Helkin

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I both used these and they worked so well! They didn’t hurt and came off easily. My nose did feel softer afterwards. He didn’t let his dry enough so two small parts did come off and stick to his nose when he ripped it off. So make sure you leave it on so the whole thing is dry and hard.
customer_reviews.author: james auger

customer_reviews.title: I love admiring the nastiness removed from my face with these
customer_reviews.text: I love admiring the nastiness removed from my face with these! The black makes the aftermath much more visible as opposed to the standard white strips. And I have tried cheaper brands with corresponding (crappy) results. Definitely sticking with these!
customer_reviews.author: sweedee

customer_reviews.title: wasted money and time
customer_reviews.text: maybe I got a defective box, but these did not work anywhere near as well as the originals. I followed the instructions and when pulling off it has left black spots all over my nose. the only place it is actually pulling from is the very top part of my nose. I know how to correctly use these because I used to use the original, but I'm super disappointed in these. I wasted my money and my time.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Issa no from me
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Biore strips since HS and I'm in my mid 30's.....And I use them religiously. I also know HOW to use them to get maximum use out of it...as in how to get the blackheads out and not just the oil on top of nose..these do not work better at all. I found them to be a waste of money which i am not happy with because i'm on a budget..but lessen learned. I did use the whole box so i know they don't work as well. Ill go back to my regular biore strips.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie C.Top Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Love Biore and their pore strips
customer_reviews.text: I love Biore deep cleansing pore strips. I've used these for 15 years. I decided to try the charcoal ones because I'm on a charcoal kick lately. They work as well as the other deep cleansing Biore pore strips, but I am not convinced that they work any better because they are charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Tizzawn

customer_reviews.title: I like the white ones better
customer_reviews.text: I think the white ones worked better than these. I see no improvement over the old ones honestly l, and if anything, I think it pulled out less gunk.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great Skincare Option
customer_reviews.text: Holy pores. I'm too nervous to try a full charcoal face mask so these strips will do the trick for now. They work really well and are cheaper on Amazon than your average drug store. If you are self conscious of your pores I definitely suggest trying these.
customer_reviews.author: Leighann Larsen

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend these.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I tried using these together and I felt that they didn’t work at all, aside from pulling out the small hairs on your nose. It did not remove any blackheads, oil or dirt from our skin. I remember using the regular Biore strips a few years ago and those seeming to work well, so maybe it’s just these charcoal ones. I also noticed it left a sticky film on our noses/cheeks, so you really have to scrub hard to get it off and it can be a bit irritating to your skin afterward. I wouldn’t recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: simply not good
customer_reviews.text: Maybe i got a bad pack or something, but i'm a frequent user of similar strips, but with this specific one.... it's easy to place, but then, when taking it off, it left black marks on my nose. When i looked at the strip after, some parts didn't even stick apparently (maybe it's the piece that stayed on my nose... It didn't feel right, so i used a strip from another brand i purchased locally and it actually did the job!
customer_reviews.author: yannick

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I should have known when the bottom of the box was open that this wasn’t going to work. Despite how wet with warm water on a clean nose IT PULLED nothing out. The material is so hard coming off Maybe expired? Just have used a CVS brand that is much better
customer_reviews.author: KarRN

customer_reviews.title: Still blackheads
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I've used these a few times, after steaming my face and nothing has happened. I've finally discovered salicylic acid and it is working much better. Maybe I'll use the rest of these to just do touch ups. I was super excited to see all the weird stuff come out of my face, but it was not as eventful as I hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Nose Strips !
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my fiance who wanted to try a nose strip. I took a before/after photo but the after photo doesn't do it justice. It removed so much gunk from his nose and his pores look great! No pain and good price.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: A much less painful alternative to black facemasks!
customer_reviews.text: My mother once tried a black facemask on my face, and boy did it hurt coming off! Luckily, we discovered black Biore strips do the job much better, and a lot less painful, and without having to look Blackfaced in this day and age! After one strip, they get a lot of gunk off your noses, and they end up looking nasty to prove it! The 18-packs sold here are a much better deal compared to real stores, and yet you only need to use them once a week, or less often! Now we know where to go for more cheap, when we need more!
customer_reviews.author: ToonXpert87

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the results. Sticks well to nose just follow step 2 to ensure nose is fully wet. I could see the difference right away in my nose. Majority of my white heads are gone after first use. I didn't get to take a before and after photo. I was excited to use the strips because I had so many white heads. Looking forward to using again in 3 days. Also I have combination/ sensitive skin and so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive on these is terrible. I tried a couple thinking maybe one was just bad strip...nope the other three I tried are just as bad. They do not stick to your nose.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I must've gotten a bad batch or something. I use these types of strips all the time. I've gotten them from the store and from different sellers and they work great. Normally they hurt when i pull them off and they remove plenty of blackheads. I've used 3 strips from this order so far and each time they fall right off not pulling anything away. No pain, no nothing even when completely dry not even one blackhead removed.
customer_reviews.author: aislinn

customer_reviews.title: Product Doesn’t Work- Waste of Money & Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I tried the product twice only to find that it Doesn't work. I looked up and followed the instructions to insure that I was applying it right. It didn’t remove hardly any blackheads, nor did it help reduce the amount that was there. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone that I know! This product is a waste of your time and money. I would recommend looking into other products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: useless. doesnt adhere well and messy
customer_reviews.text: These charcoal strips don't work well at all. they don't stick to your skin well at all. I've been using Biore stripes for decades and I've never had a problem. I'm guessing the problem is the charcoal. They're also very messy. turning everything you touch black. It's easy to clean up, but it's still unsightly. Especially if you miss some on your face. I only tried these because they were the cheapest option on Amazon. Never again. Stick with the original. They do the job that these can never do.
customer_reviews.author: enero30

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me, might for you
customer_reviews.text: It's common for us asians to have incredibly oily and clogged noses. I decided to give this a go, even though I had tried so many pore cleansing masks that nothing seemed to work. I put on a charcoal mask, washed my face in warm water and waited a good 20 minutes and took it off very carefully. The strip had nothing on it at all, with my nose still chock-full of blackheads. Over the next month or so, I used all the other pore strips and they had a similar effect as the first one. If you have a less oily nose it might work, but it didn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: mmyyli

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this product but, after multiple uses, it did not cleanse as well as I would've liked either time I used it. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work exactly like the regular Biore nose strips so buy those since they are 33% less
customer_reviews.text: These work well, just like the normal Biore nose strips. These are just more expensive with the gimic of having charcoal in them which has no noticeable difference in function or results. Just buy the regular nose strips which are 33%-50% less than these per strip.
customer_reviews.author: CustomerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Buy the white ones
customer_reviews.text: They are nice nose strips for black and white heads. They remove the dirt and impurities as well as peach fuz like the white ones. I find them a little less sticky than the white ones so you must make sure you hold them for a while so they remove the dirt from difficult areas such as the sides of the nose. I always use them in my forehead and chin, for those areas I try to wait more before removing them and avoid sweating so they don’t get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Nabilia Bueno

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these strips for my 15 year old son. These Biore Charcoal, deep cleansing strips are perfect for teenage boys that don’t like to spend much time on their skincare. As you can see in the picture that I have shared, these strips definitely work! We were surprised at the amount of dirt that was removed after the first use. I no longer have to hound him to wash his face now that he can see how dirty it is, thanks to these strips.
customer_reviews.author: KatK.

customer_reviews.title: It works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, as a teenager who's about to turn 20, I am prone to acne. I didn't realize what those things were on the top of my nose until my mom gave me a strip of a version of these, and I had to buy them. Before I touched my nose, my skin felt rough because of all the "bumps" on my skin...I put one of these on and boom! In about 15 minutes nearly all of the white stuff in the pores of my skin are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Weber

customer_reviews.text: Not sure why these have a lower rating than the original. I feel like these do a much better job. I have pretty big pores around the sides of my nose so I tend to get whiteheads a lot. These have always worked better for me than most that I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M

customer_reviews.title: Worked surprisingly well...
customer_reviews.text: Given some questionable reviews I didn't have high hopes for this nose strip. To my surprise it actually worked really well. I followed the directions exactly and left it on for the full 15 minutes. I made sure to remove it slowly as it said to and was thrilled with how much gunk it removed! It was very visible on the strip and my nose looks so much clearer. The feel of my skin is great and looks more radiant without being oily. I will definitely continue to use these on a regular basis!
customer_reviews.author: Sprinks&Bell

customer_reviews.title: Definitely try! It really helped me!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this!! I have tried facial scrubs and all kind of things to get the blackheads removed from my nose and these strips worked better than I thought. I literally had a nose full of black heads and it looked horrible now I hardly have any..it's kinda hard for them to come out the crease of your nose like on both sides but other then that I would definitely recommend and plus it's only 6 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Kamaren

customer_reviews.title: They don't work that well for me
customer_reviews.text: Personally, these don't get a lot off my skin. What they end up doing is pulling off my little facial hairs (which make the removal very painful - to the point of tears - and leaves my skin burning and red for a few minutes after). Very few blackheads or anything come out - maybe 3 or 4 max with each use and I know there's more than that. I can see blackheads near the surface of my skin that the mask can't get out which is pretty disappointing. I know they work for some people but not for me, so I'd say avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Good sticking Ability, not so great Cleansing
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try these from other reviews and some past Biore products I liked. However, other than sticking to my face better than ones in the past these strips barely removed anything from my pores. I was upset because I was able to get stuff out of my pores easily with an extractor. So..really great sticking to your skin, but not so great at grabbing anything from clogged pores. I would recommend trying something else!
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: Worked like charm!
customer_reviews.text: I've got A LOT of blackheads on my nose. I was so surprised after I use these strips! They got almost every blackhead and whitehead out! Would definitely buy again! The only problem that I had with these: they only took out my small blackheads and not any of the big one. Hence the reason for four starts.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R Beddow

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: I had heard great things about these pore strips and was really excited to try them out. I ended up being disappointed because they don't do the job as well as I hope. You have to be very generous with amount of water on your nose before putting them on and even then they dry out very quickly. I don't recommend them
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Ehh not impressed
customer_reviews.text: First use I used it in the bath and it got a little wet so it couldnt properly dry to that papier mâché feel. But still pulled a bit out. After waiting for some more gunk to build up for a second use, I got that sucker to work because upon taking it off i was in tears. Didnt really see too much besides tiny hairs and a few blavkheads but nothing like i was expecting. Will most likely go with a suction pen now.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Renae

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, I was so excited to get these in the mail. I did everything right, I steamed my face and wet my nose and waited for 15 minutes but when I took it off there was nothing on it but a little dead skin. So I tried again the next day, and again, and again. I've gone through five strips and I haven't removed a single blackhead. Am I doing something wrong? :(((
customer_reviews.author: isabella macal

customer_reviews.title: Holy guacamole!
customer_reviews.text: HOLY COW!!! The stuff that came out of my nose actually is disturbing. This stuff worked wonders. Left it to dry for 12 minutes. It left some black residue, but like the package explains, it rinsed away easily. I cleansed, did a mask and scrub prior to use and WOW the results were amazing. I’ve had blackheads for 15 years and maybe these will actually help me get rid of them!!
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cleansing your nose with the strip.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even stick to my nose, terrible product. However I did use the face wash and that was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: Not going to use ever again
customer_reviews.text: I’m not impressed with these at all. I thought the adhesion would be stronger than the regular strips but I was wrong. I couldn’t get these to adhere properly to my noise. I even cut one in half to get it to grip better to make it cover a precise area on my nose, that didn’t help one bit! I would return these if my return window didn’t close.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pore Strips!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews but this product is worth one! I’ve had a problem with black heads on my nose for about 10 years and nothing seemed to work in clearing the really tiny ones. I gave these a shot and I am more than pleased with the results. I used the product as directed and left it in place for 15 minutes before removing it. Peeling it of was a quite painful process but ALL of the black heads were gone when the strip was removed. If you have a problem with black heads I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: rwoods

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: When I peeled off the sticky part from the clear plastic it comes on, they weren’t sticky at all. I tried a few thinking one might be defective, but they were all defective. Tried to ask for refund, but they needed me to return it. How do I return something like this if I’ve tried more than one? Will not buy online again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Fuimaono

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very good price for something so important to your face care weekly routine. I washed and applied it and in 15 minutes peeled off. Super cute way and it pulls everything out of the pores. 95% came out. I'm sure when I repeat this in 2 days the few tiny spots will come out as well. Happy with this purchase and highly recommends.
customer_reviews.author: Toddler Parent

customer_reviews.title: Much better than when I tried them 20 years ago.  :)
customer_reviews.text: These work VERY well! Not sure if they're any better than the white ones although with these you can see the nasty stuff that comes out of pores better. Make sure you wet your skin VERY well before putting these one, wait until completely dry and peel off SLOWLY to make sure it pulls as much stuff out as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Nyte

customer_reviews.title: Mostly removes vellus hairs, struggles to cover nostrils well.
customer_reviews.text: So unless your noise is absolutely covered in blackheads starting to bulge out (and could probably just be squeezed out, do you even wash your face?), this product pretty much just removes vellus hairs. If you're one of those people that hates even the tiny, baby-fine hairs, then maybe this product is still valuable to you. The biggest letdown is that this product doesn't really cover the curves of the nostrils, the places most prone to blackheads.
customer_reviews.author: Danforth J. Ryder

customer_reviews.title: It does not tell u on the web page that if you have spider veins do not use, info is on side of box.
customer_reviews.text: It does not tell u on the web page that if you have spider veins do not use. That info is on the side of the box. Which you will see when you get the box.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: The strips do not stick
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if my box of strips were old and on the shelf or the product Does not work as advertised. My box was faded. Looks like a good concept.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McDevitt

customer_reviews.title: Terrible compared to the original!
customer_reviews.text: These are junk! The charcoal ones are just gimmicky, because charcoal scrubs are good for cleaning pores. Buy the original! These ones dry faster, capture and remove less blackheads, and don't stick very well compared to the original ones. If you don't really have a lot of water on your nose, they don't stick, and if you're using them anywhere but your nose, on any place with curves, like your chin, they do not stick. They are stiffer, and get air pocket underneath when you apply, so they miss whole spots! Plus, you can't tell EVEN IF they happened to pull a few blackheads, cuz you can't barely see anything on the black strip!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work. Used exactly as instructed. I will ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. Used exactly as instructed. I will buy those crazy charcoal masks next to see if I can get rid of these blackheads without visiting a Derm.
customer_reviews.author: DrefromLA

customer_reviews.title: So great for a deep clean!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I LOVE these- they’re the only pore strips I’ve found that work. Cheap, brand-less ones don’t pull anything out, and the standard biore white ones don’t seem to work the same either. You need to get this charcoal variety!! Removes even tiny blackheads you didn’t know you had. Love to use these every few weeks for deep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Worse than the original pore strips
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking that they'd be better than the original Biore pore strips, however I find that they don't work nearly as well as the regular ones. These ones aren't as strong and don't remove as many blackheads. I wish that there weren't so many that I had to go through before I can buy the other ones again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Louie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing I can say is the box in good shape.The strips wouldn’t stay on your nose even if you paid them to. Glad I didn’t buy the big box.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer3

customer_reviews.title: The strip dries out in 3 minutes and comes off easily.
customer_reviews.text: I wet my nose thoroughly and put the strip on my neck. The strip did not stick to my nose for more than 2 minutes. The instructions said to leave on for 10 minutes. After 10 minutes, the strip became hard and came off easily pulling out zero dirt or blackheads from my nose. I tried pulling the strip after 3 minutes. It still didn't get any blackheads off. I was told that I would get amazing results on the first try. I tried 6 times. Zero results!!! I have oily skin with subtle acne and blackheads on nose, cheeks. I was told this was an excellent product for my skin type. Honestly disappointed !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: annie nadir

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: Definitely have to follow the directions and they definitely feel weird. They have not worked as well as I had hoped but going to keep trying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these did not work
customer_reviews.text: These did not work at all. I tried them twice and ended up returning them. I have tried the Biore Por strips that are the white ones and those were great. I was really disappointed that these did not work for me. I would not recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jkmee24

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Love these strips! I've never had any good results with the original Biore nose strips or the charcoal peel-off masks. Those peel off without any gunk stuck to them. However, these strips actually remove my blackheads. Stocking up on these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RUN and buy this!
customer_reviews.text: These nose pore strips were sent to me from heaven. I was a bit nervous 'cause this is my first time using nose strips period. My nose was starting to look like a white polka dot pattern of PORES and this strip removed them all! My skin gets so oily I can fry chicken on them so the strips being charcoal was an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: gail Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: A lot of posts show these as being able to rip the blackheads right out of your nose. I haven't exactly had the same experience. Sure, my nose feels a little cleaner; but, overall I am just not thrilled with the product. I probably won't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Decent Strips
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several of these types of strips and these definitely are the best. Do they get all the gunk out? No. But I haven't found anything that does. These do get some, and will take the dry skin and hairs off too. Not too painful, just rip quickly;)
customer_reviews.author: Ashtree

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, will not give 5 stars but yes its fine, it does not take out all blackheads which are deep, but yes it cleans and also clears some blackheads. AND ALSO I would like to inform Manufacturers that I got &2 off coupon, which I tried to use it on again from Amazon but can't use this. Kindly provide Clear information to use coupons.
customer_reviews.author: Nash

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me... small pores, over 50.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Is meant to pull out blackheads. I have small pores and I'm over 50, maybe that's a factor.
customer_reviews.author: The Laura Customer

customer_reviews.title: sticky mess
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work. Left a sticky mess on my nose and was painful to remove every time - even though I followed directions and even reduced the amount of time it was on my skin. Terrible waste. Baking soda and a mild cleanser does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Complete Waste!
customer_reviews.text: this product is garbage. I tried this on my own nose, following the directions on the box, and also on my husband's nose and it did absolutely nothing. It does not sit well on the nose and then when it dries it's like cardboard and doesn't feel like it pulls anything out of pores. I like to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Tarin Rouhi

customer_reviews.title: This Really Works
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I've had stubborn black heads on the "Crease" of my nose for a long time. I've used this once a week after a shower for about 10 weeks and the black heads are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Sailorman

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money, cleans out everything
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I have been using it for many years. I put like 5-6 of them all over my face lol. Sometimes they have trouble sticking to chin, but I love them. The charcoal ones work better than any other type that Biore has. Most effective after hot shower or face steaming. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: They actually DO work just like they do on TV!
customer_reviews.text: Bior'e is a fantastic brand. These Charcoal blackhead strips are amazing! The TV commercial is what made me want to try them, but the results I got after the first time I used one, is why I'll keep using them. It really WAS just like the way it worked on TV! How many times in your life can you say that?! 👋🏻😃👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kay Docherty

customer_reviews.title: You will be surprised!
customer_reviews.text: First time user at age 60. I swear I'm embarrassed to post photos.....but my nose was smoother and even felt smaller after using! I bought the small package of 6 because i was unsure but I'll be back for the larger box
customer_reviews.author: MEIZRDRN

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stick well. Doesn't work well. Does not work like it does in the commercials
customer_reviews.author: karen k

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It pulled some of my whiteheads out, but only filled up about a 1/4 of the strip, so it feels like a waste. I even used it after a hot steamy shower and I have large pores all over my nose. They work not as well as I remembered years ago.
customer_reviews.author: LisaD

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal, Deep Cleansing Pore Strips
customer_reviews.text: I don't see any advantage to the charcoal. Plus, the charcoal leaves a residue behind that takes some scrubbing to get off your face. I won't buy these again. I prefer the regular (non-charcoal) strips much better.
customer_reviews.author: MrBill

customer_reviews.title: Clean pores
customer_reviews.text: I thought the chick in the commercial exaggerated her reaction to seeing what these end up pulling out of your pores. I stand corrected. They work great. Just space out when you use them or they won't pick up as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for deep cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I love the feeling of putting the nose strip and taking them off. However, after applying this, i noticed that it didn't really remove the blackheads. All i see was the white thing and a couple piece of blackhead.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: Not Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first and last time l will be ordering the charcoal strips. Results were not as effective as the white strips. It was harder to remove and left a black residue on my nose. Black heads remained where they were- on my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Best nose strip I’ve tried so far!!
customer_reviews.text: Best product by far. I have tried other brands of nose strips and they always stuck to the nose,or didn’t stick to the nose, but this strips actually pull blackheads out!!!. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My pores were so clogged and skin started peeling from my nose. I used a facial mask before I applied the strip. The facial mask helped clear the peeling skin and a little bit of the roughness. Then I did the strip just as of how the box instructed and my pores had a nice deep cleanse. Now my nose is nice and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes a REALLY long time to "Harden"
customer_reviews.text: This version doesn't adhere as well and leaves a black residue behind. I'll return to the Original next time. One plus: you can really see the gunk that comes out of your pores against the contrasting black strip 😁
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Works Well Enough
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work really well. There was a decent amount of gunk that was pulled away and onto the strip. You have to be sure that you apply it properly for it to really stick and dry on.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: These are more expensive than the white ones, but I do think that they work a bit better. It may just be because the black makes the gunk from your pores standout more, but I do like them.
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: Effectively removes whiteheads and dirt
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit sceptical but I’ve used the warming mask before and had great results. This worked amazing easy to apply dried and had a good vacuum seal that lifted dirt from my pores. Very happy with the results I will continue to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cuervo

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave it 1 star but it helps to read directions!! You have to wet your nose first so I changed my rating to 4 star. Leaves a little residue when you peel it off
customer_reviews.author: Drtvgal

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to your skin like cement
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let it sit tooooo long on your face. The adhesion definitely works to almost a disadvantage. Felt like it peeled off 1/2 my nose!!! Wouldn’t advise for sensitive skin or very young.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The product only adheres if you all a lot of water but when you add the water and put it on the strip begins to dry instantly. At the end of the 15 minute timer it is flaky and not sticky, when you pull it off nothing goes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Hamidy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy they don’t get the blackheads on nose
customer_reviews.text: Did it twice and they don’t really work. They stick almost too good some of my skin came off with it.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Thieret

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I were so excited to try these nose strips out and they were such a disappointment. We followed instructions, we even did it after we showered when we for sure knew our pores were open and still nothing. I would not recommend this to anybody. I’ve just figured out that what works for me the best is using Tweezerman skin care tool.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: Kinda disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought it cuz I saw so many good reviews and it was like amazons choice sth. Was highly expecting it however it really didn’t clean well. Disappointed will give it another try, but I’m also looking for a better product
customer_reviews.author: Lemohn

customer_reviews.title: It works!  (My daughter doubted it)
customer_reviews.text: After I had ordered this product, my daughter said that she had tried it, but didn't like it and it didn't stick very well. But I tried it and it really stuck and really worked! I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Nemchin

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This pore strip actually works! I was very surprised at how much gunk it pulled out of my pores. Will definitely have to use more to see more noticeable results but definitely worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Lin

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. They didn’t stick at all and I know how to use these because I’ve had them before. They seemed to be ”old” felt very dried out and crispy.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Beech

customer_reviews.title: Original strips work better
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Biore Strips forever and these strips are much less effective than the original strips. Very little from pores was removed. I’ll be going back to the originals.
customer_reviews.author: Cali-kaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: SOFT NOSE OMG
customer_reviews.text: You are missing these in your life. Purchase now. They make ur nose so soft and clean out every single pore. Like WOW. Just trust me. I will always buy these now.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal A.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Do not think it’s efficient for people with a lot of blackhead or fat in their pores... it barely took anything out. It was almost a joke. Not worth it for me at least
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick! Remove slowly to ensure blackheads come off on the strip! Be sure to follow directions, therefore read them before application! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Naz

customer_reviews.title: It does exactly what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions on the box by applying it to your wet nose. It takes about ten minutes for it to dry and set. If you have never used this before there will be some discomfort when removing this. I snatch mines off like I would a band aid. You should remove it more gently until you become accustomed to removing it.
customer_reviews.author: #AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Pick something else.
customer_reviews.text: Only good thing about it is that it comes off easy. Doesn’t stick enough to pull out any blackheads. This is like a cheaper version of probably a wax that’ll help more. I personally wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jawann

customer_reviews.title: husband loves these
customer_reviews.text: another #quarantine product. husband said he wanted to try some. you have to wet them to get them to stick, which is a little annoying/messy but overall highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Alfieri

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: First time I tried these and I have to say that they work for me. To be honest, I was surprised they worked so well after reading some of the negative reviews. All I can say is give them a try. They did remove some stubborn blackheads around my nose that I have always had a hard time getting rid of.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Go for the original strips instead of charcoal!
customer_reviews.text: I still use the traditional Biore Pore Strips that were made uber popular 10-15 years ago. I thought I'd try these new charcoal ones since charcoal is all the rage nowadays. These don't work half as well as the originals! They got come gunk out, but not nearly as much. I was pretty disappointed. If I were you, I'd get the original Biore Pore Strips.
customer_reviews.author: courtney kelley

customer_reviews.title: Limited usefulness
customer_reviews.text: What did it do? Makes it feel clean for a little while, then oil/clogged pores come back with a vengeance. Great for strip sales, not for skin health, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you like to see what is in your pores these are for you
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these and you know it works when she is excited to show you her results. These come off easily without causing any irritation. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Matt P

customer_reviews.title: Works better than the regular pore strips
customer_reviews.text: These charcoal pore strips seem to work 10x better than the regular ones. I found it works much better after you wash your face with warmer water. I also left it on longer than what was instructed and slowly peeled it off. It really grips the dirt. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: It didn't stick for me
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried one piece and it would come off on edges by itself. Maybe I ordered an open box, that's why, but didn't work for me very well. Pulled out some of the blackheads though but I have very tough ones.
customer_reviews.author: Shah

product_meta.title: Bioré Charcoal, Deep Cleansing 18 Nose Strips for Blackhead Removal on Oily Skin, with Instant Pore Unclogging, Features Natural Charcoal (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Style Name:CHARCOAL PORE STRIPS| Color:STANDARD CHARCOAL PORE STRIPS| Size:1 Count (18 STRIPS)Remove blackheads and shrink the size of pores with Bioré Blackhead Reducing Deep Cleansing Pore Strip. These deep cleansing nose strips target blackheads and unclog pores for healthy looking skin. Convenient and easy to use, these Pore Strips can be used 1x per week for the deepest clean. Unlike other wannabe ‘pore strips’, ONLY Bioré Deep Cleansing Pore Strips use patented C-bond technology to bind to blackheads and impurities, NOT to skin. These strips are super magnetic to safely and effectively remove dirt, oil, and even stubborn blackheads. Bioré Deep Cleansing Pore Strips leave skin feeling cleaner with visibly smaller pores after continuous use. A dermatologist-tested way to remove blackheads and purify pores.
feature_bullets: Instantly unclog your pores: Bioré pore strips instantly clean and unclog pores to purify your skin for the deepest clean in just 10 minutes
Reduce blackheads: See instant results when you use Bioré pore strips; with continual use, you can help reduce the appearance of blackheads and see a visible reduction in the size of your pores
Control oily skin: Invigorate your skincare routine with Bioré pore strips; These easy to use strips will help remove dirt and oil from your pores, leaving your skin feeling fresh and clean
Binds to blackheads, not skin: Using our patented c bond technology, Bioré pore strips are designed to be used once a week to bind to and remove blackheads not skin
Like a blackhead magnet: Our uniquely developed pore strips act like a magnet to safely and effectively remove dirt, reduce oily skin and help eliminate blackheads

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
